description_en: Monthly unemployment statistics focusing on the 15-30 age group.
description_ms: Statistik pengangguran bulanan dengan fokus pada kumpulan umur 15-30.
methodology_en: This data is produced based on the Labour Force Survey (LFS), which is designed to collect representative data on the labour force at national and state level. Consistency in methodology has been maintained to ensure that the data is comparable over time. Survey findings are a monthly, quarterly and annual basis. For a full description of the methodology, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/lfs-technotes).
methodology_ms: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB), yang bertujuan untuk mengumpul data tentang tenaga buruh di peringkat nasional dan negeri. Metodologi survei ini dipastikan konsisten untuk mendapatkan perbandingan statistik siri masa. Data daripada survei ini diterbitkan secara bulanan, suku tahunan dan tahunan. Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, sila merujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/lfs-technotes).
caveat_en: The sum of each category may not always equal to the totals shown in related tables because of independent rounding to one decimal place. However, the differences are not obvious.
caveat_ms: Hasil tambah bagi sesuatu kategori mungkin tidak sentiasa sama dengan jumlah yang ditunjukkan dalam jadual yang berkaitan kerana pembundaran secara bebas kepada satu titik perpuluhan. Walau bagaimanapun, perbezaan ini tidak ketara.
publication_en: The [Labour Force Report, Nov 2023](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/labour_month_2023-11), the latest edition of the monthly labour force statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on the labour force](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/labour-market).
publication_ms: [Laporan Tenaga Buruh, Nov 2023](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/labour_month_2023-11), edisi terkini bagi statistik tenaga buruh bulanan yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang tenaga buruh](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/labour-market).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 since the data is at monthly frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD ditetapkan sebagai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

fields.name: unemployed_15_24
fields.description_en: [Float] Number (in thousands) of people aged 15-24 who did not work but were looking for work or available to work
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah terlaras secara bermusim (dalam ribuan) orang yang tidak bekerja tetapi sedang mencari kerja atau bersedia untuk bekerja

fields.name: u_rate_15_24
fields.description_en: [Float] Ratio of unemployed aged 15-24 to labour force participants aged 15-24
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Nisbah terlaras secara bermusim jumlah penganggur ke bilangan tenaga buruh

fields.name: unemployed_15_30
fields.description_en: [Float] Number (in thousands) of people aged 15-30 who did not work but were looking for work or available to work
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah terlaras secara bermusim (dalam ribuan) orang yang tidak bekerja tetapi sedang mencari kerja atau bersedia untuk bekerja

fields.name: u_rate_15_30
fields.description_en: [Float] Ratio of unemployed aged 15-30 to labour force participants aged 15-30
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Nisbah terlaras secara bermusim jumlah penganggur ke bilangan tenaga buruh
